thread.title: NFL veterans using smarts to prove age is a number, not a hindrance
thread.title_full: NFL veterans using smarts to prove age is a number, not a hindrance

author: JOSH DUBOW
title: NFL veterans using smarts to prove age is a number, not a hindrance
text: Football Oakland Raiders’ Charles Woodson celebrates an interception against the Denver Broncos on Oct. 11. One of only two defensive backs since at least 1960 to play after turning 39, Woodson leads the NFL in picks this season. (Thearon W. Henderson/Getty Images) Oakland Raiders’ Charles Woodson celebrates an interception against the Denver Broncos on Oct. 11. One of only two defensive backs since at least 1960 to play after turning 39, Woodson leads the NFL in picks this season.(Thearon W.
